org.afree.chart.block

Class LabelBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.afree.chart.block.AbstractBlock
      • org.afree.chart.block.LabelBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, Block, Drawable

    public class LabelBlock
extends AbstractBlock
implements Block
    A block containing a label.
